Method Detail

initializeJMS

private static void initializeJMS()
                           throws java.lang.Exception

1. Create a new ActiveMQConnectionFactory from URL, which is set to ActiveMQConnection.DEFAULT_BROKER_URL

2. Use the ConnectionFactory to create a new TopicConnection and a new QueueConnection

3. Use Connections to create TopicSession for subscription and QueueSession for initialization

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

                        java.io.IOException
Load subscribe list from SubscribeList.in file Reading from SubscribeList.in file line by line until null found Determine whether it is a stock name or ID, using it to create new QuoteSubscriber instance.
